mainEntity.name: Where is Active Bridge company located

acceptedAnswer.text: A business entity in the USA, Arizona.The R&D center in Ukraine, Cherkasy has full-time employees who are provided to customers on a contract basis.

mainEntity.name: What is your average hourly rate or minimum project budget?

acceptedAnswer.text: An average Junior’s developer rate is $25/h, an average Middle developer’s rate is $35/h, an average Senior’s rate is $45/h.
Our main expertise is developing web-based systems, web applications, cloud-based software, cross-platform applications, and PWA.

mainEntity.name: How can you prove that your company provides well-designed application solutions?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can always ask for references about our work from our customers. And you can always check the ratings provided by independent sites, such as Clutch and Expertise.

mainEntity.name: What payment methods do you handle?

acceptedAnswer.text: We support wire transfer payments to our US bank account.
